user_instruction: 'Send an email with some wellness tips for my client Mark Thompson (mark.thompson@email.com). You can check out my NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Wellness Tips for Mark Thompson

Hi NotionManager Team,

I hope you’re well. Could you please pull together a concise list of evidence-based wellness tips or stress-management strategies from Jane’s notes that are specifically relevant to Mark Thompson? Jane would like to include these in an email to Mark (mark.thompson@email.com).

If you could check the appropriate workspace in Notion and share the key points at your earliest convenience, that would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you very much for your help!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]

final_output:
